Deprecated functions in chromVAR

chromVAR has moved functions and methods to camelCase from snake_case. The following functions have been deprecated and replaced with a different name:

  • get_annotation_synergy is now getAnnotationSynergy

  • make_bias_bins is now makeBiasBins

  • make_permuted_sets is now makePermutedSets

  • pwm_distance is now pwmDistance

  • plot_variability is now plotVariability

  • plot_deviations_tsne is now plotDeviationsTsne

  • get_jaspar_motifs is now getJasparMotifs

  • match_kmers is now matchKmers

  • deviations_covariability is now deviationsCovariability

  • plot_kmer_mismatch is now plotKmerMismatch

  • get_total_fragments is now getTotalFragments

  • get_fragments_per_peak is now getFragmentsPerPeak

  • get_fragments_per_sample is now getFragmentsPerSample

  • get_peaks is now getPeaks

  • get_counts is now getCounts

  • get_sample_depths is now getSampleDepths

  • read_macs2_narrowpeaks is now readNarrowpeaks

  • get_annotations is now getAnnotations

  • filter_samples is now filterSamples

  • filter_samples_plot is now filterSamplesPlot

  • filter_peaks is now filterPeaks

  • annotation_matches is now annotationMatches

  • deviations_tsne is now deviationsTsne

  • differential_deviations is now differentialDeviations

  • differential_variability is now differentialVariability

  • compute_variability is now computeVariability

  • compute_expectations is now computeExpectations

  • computeDeviations is now computeDeviations

  • deviation_scores is now deviationScores

  • get_sample_distance is now getSampleDistance

  • get_sample_correlation is now getSampleCorrelation

  • get_cis_groups is now getCisGroups

  • add_gc_bias is now addGCBias

  • get_background_peaks is now getBackgroundPeaks

  • get_permuted_data is now getPermutedData

  • assemble_kmers is now assembleKmers
